data.name: Happy Animal Testing
data.detailed_description:
Happy Animal Testing simultaneously puts you in the mindset of a cooperative lab rat, a saboteuring monkey, and a suicidal bunny. Play alone or with your friends as you attempt to navigate a maze of puzzles with ranging levels of difficulty. Work together or prove that you are the most smartest-est of your cohorts.

Game Features:

  • Multiplayer Puzzle-Platformer >𝚃𝙷𝟺𝚃 𝚆𝟷𝙻𝙻 𝚃𝙴𝟻𝚃 𝚃𝙷𝙴 𝙵𝟶𝚄𝙽𝙳𝟺𝚃𝟷𝟶𝙽 𝟶𝙵 𝚈𝟶𝚄𝚁 𝚃𝚁𝚄𝟻𝚃
  • Casual Level-Roulette >𝚃𝟶 𝙲𝟶𝚁𝚁𝚄𝙿𝚃 𝚈𝟶𝚄𝚁 𝙵𝟺𝟷𝚃𝙷 𝟷𝙽 𝙵𝚁𝟷𝙴𝙽𝙳𝟻𝙷𝟷𝙿𝟻
  • Quick-Thinking Action-Packed Levels >𝚃𝙷𝟺𝚃 𝚆𝟷𝙻𝙻 𝙿𝚁𝟶𝙱𝟺𝙱𝙻𝚈 𝙳𝙴𝟻𝚃𝚁𝟶𝚈 𝚈𝟶𝚄
  • Stylistically Simple Graphics >𝚆𝟷𝚃𝙷 𝟺 𝙵𝟶𝙲𝚄𝟻 𝟶𝙽 *𝚉𝚁𝚃* 𝙱𝚁𝚄𝚃𝟺𝙻𝟷𝚃𝚈
  • A Gigglefest >𝙵𝟶𝚁 𝚃𝙷𝟶𝟻𝙴 𝚆𝙷𝟶 𝚆𝙰𝙽𝚃 𝚃𝟶 𝟻𝙴𝙴 𝚃𝙷𝙴 𝚆𝟶𝚁𝙻𝙳 𝙱𝚄𝚁𝙽
  • Singleplayer Mode >𝙵𝟶𝚁 𝙷𝚄𝙼𝙰𝙽𝟻 𝚆𝙷𝟶 𝙷𝟺𝚃𝙴 𝙷𝚄𝙼𝙰𝙽𝟻
  • >𝚁𝙴𝚅𝙴𝙽𝙶𝙴
data.about_the_game:
Happy Animal Testing simultaneously puts you in the mindset of a cooperative lab rat, a saboteuring monkey, and a suicidal bunny. Play alone or with your friends as you attempt to navigate a maze of puzzles with ranging levels of difficulty. Work together or prove that you are the most smartest-est of your cohorts.

  • Multiplayer Puzzle-Platformer >𝚃𝙷𝟺𝚃 𝚆𝟷𝙻𝙻 𝚃𝙴𝟻𝚃 𝚃𝙷𝙴 𝙵𝟶𝚄𝙽𝙳𝟺𝚃𝟷𝟶𝙽 𝟶𝙵 𝚈𝟶𝚄𝚁 𝚃𝚁𝚄𝟻𝚃

data.short_description: Do you trust your friends? Happy Animal Testing puts your faith in your friends under a microscope. This multiplayer puzzle-platformer will see if your relationships survive testing.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.8+ Mountain Lion
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M 2 GB Intel Iris Pro 1536 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.8+ Mountain Lion
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M 2 GB Intel Iris Pro 1536 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
